author: petzku
name: Encode Clip
description: Encode a hardsubbed clip encompassing the current selection

0.4.0: Fallback to video file location if missing subtitle file
Fix major video artifacting in non-mpv players
0.5.0: Add macros for audioless clips and audio-only clips
Prefer non-ffmpeg AAC encoders, raise bitrate to 256k
0.6.0: Move shell execution to petzku.util, and require the module
0.6.1: Fix button ordering in GUI (0.6.0 messed this up, now back to audio-video-config-cancel)
0.7.0: Add audio encoder setting to config menu
0.7.1: Fix handling of spaces in mpv path
0.8.0: Notify user if non-ASCII filenames cause errors and suggest fixes (Windows)
0.8.1: Output audio-only clips as .m4a instead of .aac
0.8.2: Warn user when file not saved (if on approtriate aegisub versions)
Default to encoding video on Enter press

_scriptData.name: Encode Clip
_scriptData.description: Encode various clips from the current selection
_scriptData.author: petzku
